languages.text: "Организуйте съезд верующих и почтенных экклезиархов — задавим Эксплораторов числом".
"Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."
languages.original_text: "Организуйте съезд верующих и почтенных экклезиархов — задавим Эксплораторов числом".

traits.locale_text: "Hold a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."
"Hold a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."
"Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."
"Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

languages.text: "Beruft einen Kongress von Gläubigen und angesehenen Ekklesiarchen ein. Wir werden die Exploratoren zahlenmäßig überwältigen."
languages.original_text: "Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

traits.locale_text: "Beruft einen Kongress von Gläubigen und angesehenen Ekklesiarchen ein. Wir werden die Exploratoren zahlenmäßig überwältigen."

languages.text: "İnananlardan ve saygın Ekleşiarklardan oluşan bir kongre toplansın. Keşiftörleri salt sayımızla alt edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

traits.locale_text: "İnananlardan ve saygın Ekleşiarklardan oluşan bir kongre toplansın. Keşiftörleri salt sayımızla alt edeceğiz."

languages.text: «Convoquen un comité de feligreses y eclesiarcas respetados. Abrumaremos a los Exploradores a base de superioridad numérica».
languages.original_text: "Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

traits.locale_text: «Convoquen un comité de feligreses y eclesiarcas respetados. Abrumaremos a los Exploradores a base de superioridad numérica».

languages.text: “召集整个星区内所有信徒与受人尊重的教长，我们可以依靠人数优势迫使那些开拓者就范。”
languages.original_text: "Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

traits.locale_text: “召集整个星区内所有信徒与受人尊重的教长，我们可以依靠人数优势迫使那些开拓者就范。”

languages.text: « Convoquez un congrès de croyants et d'ecclésiastiques respectés. Leur nombre devrait suffire à intimider les Explorators. »
languages.original_text: "Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

traits.locale_text: « Convoquez un congrès de croyants et d'ecclésiastiques respectés. Leur nombre devrait suffire à intimider les Explorators. »

languages.text: 「信徒と名のあるエクレジアークの評議会を招集しろ。エクスプロレーターどもを数で圧倒する」
languages.original_text: "Call a congress of believers and respected Ecclesiarchs. We will overwhelm the Explorators with sheer numbers."

traits.locale_text: 「信徒と名のあるエクレジアークの評議会を招集しろ。エクスプロレーターどもを数で圧倒する。」
